article_title: Two Months On From Hobby Lobby Ruling, Grocery Co-ops Dump Eden Foods Products From Shelves

article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor

og.description: Eden Foods avoided the same months-long media glare and massive protests that plagued Hobby Lobby after June's SCOTUS ruling, but it did not escape without a boycott effort by some of the country's best-known regional grocery co-ops.
og.title: Two Months On From Hobby Lobby Ruling, Grocery Co-ops Dump Eden Foods Products From Shelves
